sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-chart :options="pie" />
</template>

<script>
import { Pie } from 'vue-chartjs'
export default {
  extends: Pie,
  data () {
    return {
      chartData: {
        labels: ["Italy", "India", "Japan", "USA",],
        datasets: [{
            borderWidth: 1,
            borderColor: [
            'rgba(255,99,132,1)',
            'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)',
            'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)',
            'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)'
            ],
            backgroundColor: [
            'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)',
            'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)',
            'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)',
            'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)',
            ],
            data: [1000,	500,	1500,	1000]
          }]
      },
      options: {
        legend: {
          display: true
        },
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false
      }
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    this.renderChart(this.chartData, this.options)
  }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
